lines.text: Honesty and wit are so rarely combined.
Peasants feed aristocrats as well as mosquitoes.
Le roi n'est pas un sujet.
Learn to hide your insincerity, so I may yield without dishonor.
Don't laugh with your mouth open. It's too rustic.
A woman who throws herself at a man always loses him.
Half naked and with the name of Stinking Bear, and he almost makes us look ridiculous.
Fresh from the country, you must find our courtly ways ridiculous.
